cause.description:
Check us out:
http://www.newurbanism.org
1. Sprawl is wasteful, produces dependence on foreign oil due to automobile-centered layout, and creates an environment antithical to civic involvement.
2. Traditional neighborhoods foster community, diversity, and a healthier lifestyle.
3. Ending sprawl will lessen traffic, create better community level relationships, and help to preserve open space.
cause.mission: Promote a retun to building traditonal neighborhoods in the model of the classic American small town, and to put a permenent end to wasteful suburban sprawl.
cause.name: New Urbanism
